author: Elastic
attributes.description: Identifies when an Azure Automation runbook is deleted. An adversary may delete an Azure Automation runbook in order to disrupt their target's automated business operations or to remove a malicious runbook for defense evasion.
attributes.name: Azure Automation Runbook Deleted
attributes.note:
## Setup

The Azure Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
attributes.query:
event.dataset:azure.activitylogs and
    azure.activitylogs.operation_name:"MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION/AUTOMATIONACCOUNTS/RUNBOOKS/DELETE" and 
    event.outcome:(Success or success)
